document.full_text: pavel datsyuk was among the three finalists for the frank selke trophy wednesday, giving the detroit red wings center a chance to become the first player in 30 years to win the award in four straight seasons.
document.title: datsyuk, kesler and toews finalists for selke trophy
lines_and_colors: pavel datsyuk was among the three finalists for the frank selke trophy wednesday, giving the detroit red wings center a chance to become the first player in 30 years to win the award in four straight seasons.
